main_text.sentence: This finding was inconsistently reported by other investigators [24,25].
This finding has not been confirmed by all investigators[9,10].
However, other investigators have identified only hematopoeitic chimerism by HSCs [32].
This is consistent with what has been reported by other investigators [1,3].
Stokes' two books are excellent resources for investigators new to validation [2,3].
Some investigators have used identification of barriers as an intervention in itself [19,38,39].
